600.description: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feelings to others. When angry, it rotates faster.

601.description: The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge.

602.description: While one alone doesn’t have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.

603.description: They coil around foes and shock them with electricity-generating organs that seem simply to be circular patterns.

604.description: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.

605.description: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent’s brain, causing unendurable headaches.

606.description: It can manipulate an opponent’s memory. Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three different-colored fingers.

607.description: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.

608.description: This ominous Pokémon is feared. Through cities it wanders, searching for the spirits of the fallen.

609.description: It absorbs a spirit, which it then burns. By waving the flames on its arms, it puts its foes into a hypnotic trance.

610.description: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.

611.description: Since a broken tusk will not grow back, they diligently sharpen their tusks on river rocks after they’ve been fighting.

612.description: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.

613.description: When it is not feeling well, its mucus gets watery and the power of its Ice-type moves decreases.

614.description: It can make its breath freeze at will. Very able in the water, it swims around in northern seas and catches prey.

615.description: When its body temperature goes up, it turns into steam and vanishes. When its temperature lowers, it returns to ice.

616.description: When attacked, it defends itself by closing the lid of its shell. It can spit a sticky, poisonous liquid.

617.description: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.

618.description: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.

619.description: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.

620.description: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.

621.description: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.

622.description: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.

623.description: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.

624.description: Blades comprise this Pokémon’s entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.

625.description: It leads a group of Pawniard. It battles to become the boss, but will be driven from the group if it loses.

626.description: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.

627.description: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.

628.description: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.

629.description: Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.

630.description: It makes a nest out of bones it finds. It grabs weakened prey in its talons and hauls it to its nest of bones.

631.description: It breathes through a hole in its tail while it burns with an internal fire. Durant is its prey.

632.description: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.

633.description: It tends to bite everything, and it is not a picky eater. Approaching it carelessly is dangerous.

634.description: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.

635.description: This brutal Pokémon travels the skies on its six wings. Anything that moves seems like a foe to it, triggering its attack.

636.description: This Pokémon was believed to have been born from the sun. When it evolves, its entire body is engulfed in flames.

637.description: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona’s fire provided a replacement for the sun.

638.description: This legendary Pokémon battled against humans to protect Pokémon. Its personality is calm and composed.

639.description: This Pokémon came to the defense of Pokémon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.

640.description: This Pokémon fought humans in order to protect its friends. Legends about it continue to be passed down.

641.description: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.

642.description: Countless charred remains mar the landscape of places through which Thundurus has passed.

643.description: This Pokémon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.

644.description: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.

645.description: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as “The Guardian of the Fields.”

646.description: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.

647.description: By blasting water from its hooves, it can glide across water. It excels at using leg moves while battling.

648.description: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.

649.description: Over 300 million years ago, it was feared as the strongest of hunters. It has been modified by Team Plasma.
